name: Ludwig Und Adolf
description: This entertaining and diverse tour takes you back to decades in the last two centuries which shaped the appearance of todays Munich. You will walk from Ludwigs impressive boulevard north of the Old town to the Briennerstraße and into the Museums District which is the home of some of the worlds most important art galleries. Last stop of the “black tour” is the beautiful Königsplatz (King’s square) where the Nazi party installed its headquarters and had big military parades.
